title: Salignac-de-Mirambeau
text: Salignac-de-Mirambeau is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in the <a href="Nouvelle-Aquitaine">Nouvelle-Aquitaine</a> <a href="Regions%20of%20France">region</a> in southwestern <a href="France">France</a>.
